content: In this morning's press release, reported Westlake Partners first quarter 2022 net income of $16 million or $0.46 per unit. In this morning's press release, we reported Westlake Partners first quarter 2022 net income of $66 million or $0.46 per unit. Our ethylene sales agreement, which provides a predictable fee-based cash flow structure from our take-or-pay contract with Westlake or 95% of OpCo's production, we'll continue to deliver the stable and predictable cash flows driven by continued elevated demand from healthy market fundamentals, we feel confident our third-party sales should continue to deliver positive margins in 2022.
